The user has the ability to manifest special red, glowing, malleable chakra, which, when on standby, float in a [[wikipedia:chakram|chakram]]-like formation behind their back. The user is able to manipulate it to form various makeshift tools and weapons, similar to [[Truth-Seeking Ball]]s. The tools created were powerful enough to create craters when struck against the ground and, when used by Kinshiki, cleanly bisect his [[Momoshiki's Planet|planet]]'s [[God Tree]]. Not only can the user manifest multiple tools and weapons at once, but they can also manipulate the tools telekinetically.

When dispelling the technique or otherwise, the user is able to disintegrate the tools like shattered glass and reshape them.

== Trivia ==
* This ability draws inspiration from the {{translation|Seven Tools of [[wikipedia:Benkei|Benkei]]|弁慶の七つ道具|Benkei no Nanatsudōgu}}.
* In the manga, the weapons cease to glow after they're manifested, resembling actual physical weapons made of wood and metal.
* Kinshiki Ōtsutsuki was claimed to be able to absorb ninjutsu with this technique, however this was never displayed.<ref>[[Zai no Sho]], page 39</ref>
** In the anime, Urashiki Ōtsutsuki has displayed this with his chakra fishing rod.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 128</ref>
* While unnamed in the anime and manga, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]''.
